author: Special Correspondent
text:
Retired transport employees’ plea

The State Transport and Transport Corporations Retired Employees Welfare Association urged the State Government to do away the new pension scheme.

In a petition to the Managing Director of the Salem region of the Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation here, K. Kandasamy, secretary of the Association said that the pension benefits of should be informed to the retiring staff three months in advance.

He demanded the TNSTC to extend medical benefits to all its retired employees on the lines of the other government departments and Tangedco.

The TNSTC should provide the entire pension arrears along with 22 months DA arrears with immediate effect.
title: ‘Do away with the new pension scheme’
